channel.title: La Fiesta Mexicana on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti
channel.description: Recent content in La Fiesta Mexicana on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti

item.title: Tomatillo
item.description: I bought a little box of tomatillos from Argus Farm Stop. The question now is what to do with them. Suggestions so far include: fried like green tomatoes, slice thin, coat with a thin batter roasted them with onions and jalapenos and make into a salsa raw tomatillo salsa a la Rick Bayless fried with onions and then add to scrambled eggs for tortillas baked shrimp with tomatillos, feta, and cilantro carne en su jugo, a la La Fiesta Mexicana in Ypsilanti in pastel de Montezuma What I ended up making was a very simplified version of Tomatillo Breakfast Tacos, reducing the recipe to just onions, tomatillos, and eggs.
